def Load(widget): import clr from Benner.Tecnologia.Business import Query clr.AddReference("Benner.ERP.Comum") from Benner.ERP.Comum import Utils from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityState
if widget.ProviderWidget <> None and (widget.ProviderWidget.Entity == None or widget.ProviderWidget.Entity.State == EntityState.Initialized): widget.Hidden = True return
sqlOrcamentoPublico = Query("SELECT ORCAMENTOPUBLICO FROM FN_PARAMETROS WHERE EMPRESA = "+str(Utils.ObterEmpresaCorrente())) result = sqlOrcamentoPublico.Execute()
ehOrcamentoPublico = result[0]["ORCAMENTOPUBLICO"].GetBoolean()
widget.View.FieldDefinitions["STATUSPEDIDOEMPENHO"].Visible = ehOrcamentoPublico
